uttaksplan.periodeListeContent.familiehe: If {erFarEllerMedmor, select, true {{navnMor}} other {you}} give birth before term, {erFarEllerMedmor, select, true {{navnMor}} other {you}} start using the quota {erFarEllerMedmor, select, true {her} other {your}} from birth. The rest of the three weeks will be deleted. If {erFarEllerMedmor, select, true {{navnMor}} other {you}} give birth after term, {erFarEllerMedmor, select, true {{navnMor}} other {you}} will use the shared period until the birth.

Mother gets 3 weeks of parental benefits set aside to be used before term. If the baby is born before term, the days from this period will be lost, and the mother will start using the maternity quota from the day the baby is born.
If the baby is born after term, the mother will use some days from the shared period before the birth, but will not start using the maternity quota until after the baby is born.
uttaksplan.periodeListeContent.overførin: Transfer of {stønadskontoNavn} quota because {navnPåAnnenForelder} is too ill to care for the child
Transfer of {stønadskontoNavn} quota because {navnPåAnnenForelder} no longer has custody of the child
Transfer of {stønadskontoNavn} quota because {navnPåAnnenForelder} has lost the right to parental benefits
Transfer of {stønadskontoNavn} quota because {navnPåAnnenForelder} is hospitalized

leggTilPeriodeModal.hvaVilDuGjøre.påkrev: You must choose what you want to do
leggTilPeriodeModal.kontoType.påkrevd: You must choose which account to use

leggTilPeriodeModal.stillingsprosent.måV: The percentage must be a number
The percentage must be a number greater than 0
The percentage cannot be more than 100
endreTidsPeriodeModal.fom.påkrevd: You must specify a start date
endreTidsPeriodeModal.fom.gyldigDato: The start date must be a valid date in dd.mm.yyyy format
endreTidsPeriodeModal.fom.førTilDato: The start date must be equal to or before the end date.
endreTidsPeriodeModal.fom.måVæreUkedag: The start date cannot be a weekend.
endreTidsPeriodeModal.tom.påkrevd: You must specify an end date
endreTidsPeriodeModal.tom.gyldigDato: The end date must be a valid date in dd.mm.yyyy format
endreTidsPeriodeModal.tom.førTilDato: The end date must be equal to or after the start date.
endreTidsPeriodeModal.tom.måVæreUkedag: The end date cannot be a weekend.
endreTidsPeriodeModal.riktigKvoteFørFøds: Only the shared period and parental benefits before birth can be used before the due date
Only the shared period and parental benefits before birth can be used before birth
endreTidsPeriodeModal.foreldrepengerFørF: Parental benefits before birth can only be taken in the three weeks before birth.
Only parental benefits before birth can be taken in the three weeks before birth.
endreTidsPeriodeModal.fellesperiodeOverF: The shared period cannot overlap with parental benefits before birth.
endreTidsPeriodeModal.ferieFørsteSeksUke: Vacation cannot be scheduled during the first six weeks after birth.
Vacation cannot be scheduled during the first six weeks after the due date.
endreTidsPeriodeModal.minDato: The shared period cannot overlap with parental benefits before birth.
